## \_addOrUpdateRange() function

Merge two arrays of objects, updating any objects that overlap

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _addOrUpdateRange<T>(originals: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, newEntities: Maybe<ImmutableArray<T>>, identifier: Prop<Immutable<T>>): Immutable<T>[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  originals | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | The original array of objects that may be overriden |
|  newEntities | Maybe&lt;ImmutableArray&lt;T&gt;&gt; | The new array of objects that should be added |
|  identifier | Prop&lt;Immutable&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A property on the object that uniquely identifies it |

<b>Returns:</b>

Immutable&lt;T&gt;\[\]
